arts.ttl: "We had no other option" - Flick addresses shock Barca loss to Osasuna
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick accepts full responsibility for his team's 4-2 loss to Osasuna in La Liga on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: La Liga results round-up: Osasuna stun Barcelona
arts.sum: There was a shock in Spain’s top tier on Saturday evening as La Liga leaders Barcelona lost their unbeaten record. Hansi Flick’s team boasted a perfect record of seven wins from seven games heading into the weekend’s action but lost for the first time in La Liga this season at Osasuna. Ante Budimir opened the […] The post La Liga results round-up: Osasuna stun Barcelona first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Osasuna 4-2 Barcelona: Player ratings as Catalan giant slip to first defeat of the season
arts.sum: Refusing to settle for three, Osasuna wrapped up the game after former Real Oviedo star Abel Bretones fired a stunning strike past Pena, marking his first La Liga goal. CB: Sergi Dominguez - 3/10 - A very poor performance from Dominguez who handed the hosts another chance to score after a lunging into a tackle on Budimir and giving Osasuna a penalty.

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick ‘protects’ Barcelona players after Osasuna humbling
arts.sum: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick was firm in his assessment of their loss at Osasuna but backed his players at full time. La Blaugrana saw their 100% La Liga record ended at seven wins since the start of the season as they struggled in Pamplona. A 2-0 half time deficit had Flick’s team on the back […] The post Hansi Flick ‘protects’ Barcelona players after Osasuna humbling appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star adamant ‘we have to win the Champions League’ after Osasuna loss
arts.sum: A member of the attacking ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona called for lofty targets to be reached, on the back of the club’s latest outing on Saturday. This, of…

arts.ttl: Barça unbeaten run ends with shock Osasuna loss
arts.sum: Ante Budimir scored twice to help Osasuna earn a shock 4-2 home win over leaders Barcelona and hand the visitors their first defeat of the LaLiga season on Saturday.

arts.ttl: ‘Not fair’ – Barcelona star highlights refereeing errors after Osasuna defeat
arts.sum: Barcelona star Pedri was highly critical of the team of officials, on the back of his side’s latest outing on Saturday. This, of course, comes after an altogether difficult evening…

arts.ttl: Osasuna 4-2 Barcelona: Osasuna hits four to dismantle Barcelona
arts.sum: The breakthrough came early, with Bryan Zaragoza-who had already caused Barcelona problems in the past-delivering a perfect cross for Budimir to score with a header. Despite protests from Barcelona regarding a possible foul on Pau Víctor in the build-up, the goal stood, and Osasuna went into halftime with a 2-0 lead.

arts.ttl: Osasuna 4-2 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats from La Liga clash
arts.sum: Ante Budimir scores twice as Osasuna record a 4-2 victory over La Liga leaders Barcelona at El Sadar on Saturday night.
La Liga leaders Barcelona were on Saturday night subjected to a first defeat of the campaign in Spain’s top-flight. As much came in altogether concerning fashion, at the hands of…
